Package org.milyn.templating.freemarker

FreeMarker templating for Smooks.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FreeMarkerContentHandlerFactory
    FreeMarker templating Visitor Creator class.
    FreeMarkerTemplateProcessor
    FreeMarker template application ProcessingUnit.
    NodeModelSerializer
    Serialize a NodeModel variable to the template stream.

Package org.milyn.templating.freemarker Description

FreeMarker templating for Smooks.

Package Summary

The resources in this package add support for Smooks node-level template based transformations using the FreeMarker templating engine.
